positive_phenotypes: Neurodevelopmental disorder, mitochondrial, with abnormal movements and lactic acidosis, with or without seizures

num_tested_probands: The report states that a total of 19 different mitochondrial tRNA synthetases exist and are essential for mitochondrial protein synthesis.
No probands were tested in this study.
num_positive_het_probands: No proband is reported to be heterozygous for a pathogenic variant.
There is no information on the number of heterozygous probands.
positive_phenotypes: The patient presents with a severe hyperkinetic movement disorder, dystonia, chorea, and ballism, which are consistent with the clinical phenotypes of mitochondrial disorders.
num_compound_or_double_hets: Two probands are reported to have compound or double heterozygous mutations in the WARS2 gene.
There is no information on compound or double heterozygotes.

quote_snippets.num_tested_probands: The report states that a total of 19 different mitochondrial tRNA synthetases exist and are essential for mitochondrial protein synthesis.
quote_snippets.text: Mitochondrial diseases can be caused by pathogenic variants in the nuclear DNA or in the mitochondrial DNA itself.1 They can result in variable clinical signs and symptoms.

quote_snippets.num_positive_het_probands: No proband is reported to be heterozygous for a pathogenic variant.
quote_snippets.text: No pathogenic or likely pathogenic variants were detected in the mitochondrial DNA.

quote_snippets.positive_phenotypes: The patient presents with a severe hyperkinetic movement disorder, dystonia, chorea, and ballism, which are consistent with the clinical phenotypes of mitochondrial disorders.
quote_snippets.text: All presented neu-rodevelopmental as well as complex movement disorders and variable other findings such as epilepsy or retinitis pigmentosa,

quote_snippets.num_compound_or_double_hets: Two probands are reported to have compound or double heterozygous mutations in the WARS2 gene.
quote_snippets.text: The patient received symptomatic treatment with tiapridhydro-chloride up to 450 mg per day, which reduced the occurrence and the amplitude of the hyperkinetic movements and did not cause drowsiness.

quote_snippets.quote: There was no funding for this study. All authors have no conﬂicts of interest to report.
